statements: SELECT influencer_name, performance_rating FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers;
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT influencer_name, collaboration_date FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers WHERE collaboration_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers;
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers WHERE collaboration_platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT influencer_name, collaboration_platform FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers WHERE performance_rating > 8 ORDER BY influencer_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, performance_rating FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers WHERE collaboration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers WHERE collaboration_platform = 'YouTube' AND performance_rating < 5 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, campaign_name FROM GuerrillaMarketingInfluencers WHERE collaboration_platform = 'TikTok' ORDER BY influencer_id ASC, performance_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, collaboration_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, campaign_performance FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers JOIN collaboration_history ON guerrilla_marketing_influencers.influencer_id = collaboration_history.influencer_id;

SELECT influencer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_collaborations FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers JOIN collaboration_history ON guerrilla_marketing_influencers.influencer_id = collaboration_history.influencer_id GROUP BY influencer_name ORDER BY total_collaborations DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, collaboration_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, collaboration_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history WHERE campaign_performance = 'High';
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, collaboration_date FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE followers_count > 5000 ORDER BY collaboration_date;
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, instagram_handle FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE instagram_handle IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT collaboration_id, campaign_name, collaboration_date FROM collaboration_history WHERE payment_amount > 500;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, instagram_handle, followers_count FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM collaboration_history JOIN guerrilla_marketing_influencers ON collaboration_history.influencer_id = guerrilla_marketing_influencers.influencer_id;

SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, collaboration_date FROM collaboration_history JOIN guerrilla_marketing_influencers ON collaboration_history.influencer_id = guerrilla_marketing_influencers.influencer_id WHERE collaboration_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate, conversion_rate, click_through_rate FROM performance_metrics JOIN collaboration_history ON performance_metrics.collaboration_id = collaboration_history.collaboration_id WHERE engagement_rate > 5 AND conversion_rate < 3;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count > 10000;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Companies ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, company_id, collaboration_date FROM Collaborations WHERE performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT payment_id, collaboration_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Payments;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, follower_count FROM Influencers WHERE follower_count > 5000;
SELECT * FROM Collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM Companies WHERE industry = 'Fashion' ORDER BY company_name ASC;

SELECT influencer_name, company_name, payment_amount FROM Influencers i JOIN Collaborations c ON i.influencer_id = c.influencer_id JOIN Payments p ON c.collaboration_id = p.collaboration_id WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM brand_accounts;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category FROM brand_accounts ORDER BY brand_name DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_handle FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT brand_name, brand_category FROM brand_accounts WHERE brand_category = 'Fashion' ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT collaboration_id, collaboration_type, collaboration_date FROM collaboration_history WHERE influencer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, social_media_handle FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers WHERE influencer_id = '8d873f15-0e3b-4cf7-8bc4-ede8f2d8e667';
SELECT brand_name, collaboration_type FROM collaboration_history WHERE collaboration_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT influencer_name, performance_metric, performance_value FROM guerrilla_marketing_influencers JOIN influencer_performance ON guerrilla_marketing_influencers.influencer_id = influencer_performance.influencer_id;
SELECT brand_name, brand_category, follower_count FROM brand_accounts JOIN influencer_followers ON brand_accounts.brand_id = influencer_followers.follower_id ORDER BY follower_count DESC;
